title: GA5 Question 8 - GPT Model Selection
content: For GA5 Question 8, you must use gpt-3.5-turbo-0125, even if the AI Proxy only supports gpt-4o-mini. Use the OpenAI API directly.

title: OpenAI Package Installation
content: Install with: pip install openai. Make sure you have the latest version. Set API key as environment variable.

title: Docker vs Podman Discussion
content: Both Docker and Podman are acceptable for assignments. Choose based on your system. Document your choice.
